originalText.text: Midtown's been looking after my old ride for a while now, and they've always been straight-up honest and careful with it. Like the time my car flunked the inspection over some small thing, they just gave me the lowdown, no extra charge or funny business. Their crew, especially Mike, is top-notch, always ready to spot a problem without pushing you to get it fixed right then. They've done a bunch of work on my car – from fixing the rear AC blower to painting the bumper – and they always treat me right. If you hang around as a regular, they might even cut you a deal on the service. Trust me, these guys are the real deal.

originalText.text: Tragic. Please do not waste your money at this spot. They took my car in for a repair just for them not to find the actual issue. My car was having issues as I drove away from the repair shop. I brought my car back the very next day and was told that my car service was under warranty since they did not fix the issue - THEY LIED. When I went to go pick up the car they told me that I owed them over $500. I could not get my car until I paid this fee. My car still is not working properly. Please, please please DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY HERE. I wish I could give them no stars...

originalText.text: These guys are great! The underbody cover partially fell off my BMW while I was in town visiting. They got me in and out in less than an hour. Super friendly, great prices, clean shop.

text.text: These guys are great! The underbody cover partially fell off my BMW while I was in town visiting. They got me in and out in less than an hour. Super friendly, great prices, clean shop.

originalText.text: I came for the NYS inspection. The technician detected worned out rear brake pads. New pads were ordered and immediately installed. The entire visit lasted just 2 hours. They were courteous, efficient and the price was reasonable. The only thing that needs improvement is the waiting area, which is hardly can be called a such. But to me it is a minor thing and overall I am very satisfied with the service. I will certainly use their service if I will need one.

originalText.text: If you need to get a NY State inspection done on your car, look no further than here.  After calling and visiting a few other "inspection stations," I decided to bring my vehicle here.  While the facilities may not be visually appealing or have a posh customer waiting area, the service was excellent, and the price was transparent.  I met the owners, Michael and Leon, and they were very professional and personable.  The rate for an inspection is $35/$37 (which is dictated by The NY State), so don't believe other shops if they give you a higher price.  Definitely recommended and now I know where I will take all our cars when they need a NY State inspection.
